item.title: 惊奇对决》登上游戏排行榜，网易和迪士尼大获全胜
item.description: 网易公司和华特迪士尼公司联合推出的新视频游戏《Marvel Rivals》在这个假期攀升至 PC 和游戏机排行榜，使这款免费超级英雄射击游戏成为两家公司的新热门游戏。【原文：Marvel Rivals, a new video game from NetEase Inc. and Walt Disney Co., is climbing PC and console charts this holiday season, making the free-to-play superhero shooter title a fresh hit for the two companies.】

item.title: Salesforce 通过抢夺药品客户挑起与 Veeva 的争斗
item.description: Salesforce 公司称，它正在从前合作伙伴 Veeva Systems 公司手中抢夺多个大客户，双方在向制药行业销售软件的竞争中愈演愈烈。【原文：Salesforce Inc. says it’s taking multiple large customers from former partner Veeva Systems Inc. in a mounting rivalry to sell software to the pharmaceutical industry.】

item.title: 量子计算终于来了。但它是什么？
item.description: 四十年前，物理学家就提出理论，认为可以利用量子物理学中令人匪夷所思的力学原理，制造出一种新型计算机，其功能比传统计算机强大数倍。现在，一系列突破使 "量子实用 "更接近现实。目前，人们正竞相开发精确到足以忠实模拟复杂现实世界现象行为的机器，并在药物开发、金融建模和计算机科学等领域实现飞跃。【原文：Four decades ago, physicists were theorizing that the mind-bending mechanics of quantum physics could be harnessed to make a new kind of computer that’s exponentially more powerful than conventional machines. A series of breakthroughs has now brought “quantum utility” closer to reality. A race is on to develop machines that are accurate enough to faithfully model the behavior of complex real-world phenomena and deliver a leap forward in fields as varied as drug development, financial modeling an】

item.title: 互联网推动广告销售额在 2024 年达到 1 万亿美元，无论好坏

But first...】

item.title: 美国立法者寻求加强国内造船业
item.description: 最近，海洋航运吸引了美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的注意，一项得到两党支持的新法案为他在第二任期内如何制定美国海事政策提供了一些线索。【原文：Ocean shipping has grabbed President-elect Donald Trump’s ear of late, and a new bill with bipartisan backing offers some clues about how US maritime policy may play out during his second term.】

item.title: 美国因特朗普议程和 ETF 需求而重新成为加密货币市场的领头羊
item.description: 随着 2025 年的临近，加密货币市场的重心又回到了美国，这得益于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次当选总统，以及美国数字资产基金和衍生品合约需求的不断扩大。【原文：The crypto market’s center of gravity is back in the US as 2025 approaches, courtesy of Donald Trump’s reelection to the presidency and widening demand for the nation’s digital-asset funds and derivatives contracts.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚面临重蹈巴西代价高昂的财政错误的风险
item.description: 哥伦比亚和巴西都是由左派总统掌权，他们都有雄心勃勃的社会议程。现在，这两个相邻的拉美国家又有了一个共同点：投资者对政府财政的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Colombia and Brazil are both run by leftist presidents with ambitious social agendas. Now the neighboring Latin American nations have something else in common: growing investor fears about government finance.】

item.title: 2025 年即将来临，美联储和债券交易商团结一致
item.description: 近年来，华尔街和美联储并没有完全步调一致。投资者大多没有预测到大流行病后利率会涨到多高，然后认为利率下调的速度会比实际快得多。但那些受雇预测债券市场的人可能会从央行那里获得进入2025年的线索。【原文：Wall Street and the Federal Reserve haven’t exactly been in lockstep in recent years.Investors mostly failed to forecast how high interest rates would go after the pandemic and then thought they would be cut much faster than they were.But those paid to predict the bond market may be taking their cues from the central bank into 2025.Strategists at major banks envisage short-term US Treasury yields dropping over the year, despite the risk President-elect Donald Trump’s trade and tax policies play】

item.title: 野火之战正在向高科技发展
item.description:
初创公司正在利用化学、卫星和人工智能等一切手段来探测和预防因全球变暖而加剧的火灾。【原文：

Startups are using everything from chemistry to satellites and artificial intelligence to detect and prevent fires turbocharged by global warming.

item.title: 新闻周刊》称 "公平指数 "有助于杂志应对偏见指控
item.description: 一年多以前，《新闻周刊》开始在其在线报道中附加 "公正度量表"，据该刊称，这一做法得到了读者的大力支持，尽管一些行业观察家认为对文章进行偏见评级的想法没有必要。【原文：A “fairness meter” that Newsweek began attaching to its online stories more than a year ago has been generating strong support from readers, according to the publication, though some industry observers find the idea of rating articles for bias unnecessary.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产向 2024 年收益发起最后冲击
item.description: 新兴市场资产周二上涨，主要股票指数在亚洲科技股反弹和中国准备推出更多刺激政策的迹象推动下，以两位数的涨幅结束了今年的行情。【原文：Emerging-market assets rose Tuesday, with the main equities gauge pushing to close out the year with double-digit gains on the back of an Asian tech rally and signs China is gearing up to unleash more stimulus.】

item.title: 英国启动电动汽车销售授权审查遭业界批评
item.description: 在部长们考虑放宽电动汽车制造商正在努力争取的销售配额之际，英国政府正在给汽车制造商八周的时间来提交有关逐步淘汰新型汽油车和柴油车的意见。【原文：The UK government is giving carmakers eight weeks to submit views on the phase-out of new gasoline and diesel cars, as ministers consider easing sales quotas that electric vehicle manufacturers are struggling to hit.】

item.title: 咖啡反弹迫使交易商寻求其他对冲计划
item.description: 咖啡价格一路飙升，对于在世界各地购买、销售和运输咖啡豆的贸易商来说，这意味着要承受更多的风险。他们转而采用其他方式来对冲价格，避免或推迟因价格波动而造成的资金紧张。【原文：Coffee prices have been on a tear and for the traders who buy, sell and ship beans around the world this means navigating additional risks. They’re turning to alternative ways to hedge prices and avoid or delay the cash crunch caused by volatile moves.】

item.title: 莫桑比克当选总统希望在动乱后恢复投资者信心
item.description: 当选总统丹尼尔-查波计划举行民族和解对话，以化解政治危机，恢复投资者信心。【原文：President-Elect Daniel Chapo plans a national-reconciliation dialog to resolve a political crisis and restore investor confidence after violent protests battered Mozambique since the Oct. 9 poll.】

item.description: 据预测，本周德国的风力发电量将急剧下降，但由于假期期间的需求低于往常，价格影响可能会受到抑制。【原文：Germany’s wind generation is forecast to plunge this week but the price effect will likely be damped by lower-than-usual demand during the holiday period.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气公司扩大涨幅，过境协议还剩一周时间
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格连续第四天上涨，原因是持续存在的供应担忧，距离俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的关键过境协议到期仅剩一周时间。【原文：European natural gas prices rose for a fourth day on persistent supply concerns, with just a week left until a key transit deal between Russia and Ukraine expires.】

item.title: 据说中国数据中心运营商悠活将考虑在美国上市

item.title: 欧洲银行股从 2020 年以来最繁忙的一年中获得提振
item.description: 自 2020 年以来，欧洲银行吸引了最多的并购交易，这股交易热潮推动了这些银行的股价表现超越同行，并有望延续到明年。【原文：European banks have attracted the most M&A since 2020 in a flurry of dealmaking that has powered peer-beating performance in their stocks and looks set to spill over into next year.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望在较短交易日内上涨
泰国内阁批准 2025 年保持 1%-3%的通胀目标
item.description: 泰国内阁批准了一项在 2025 年保持官方通胀目标不变的协议，这是泰国央行在抵制了要求提高目标的呼声后取得的胜利，因为提高目标将为更多的降息铺平道路。【原文：Thailand’s cabinet endorsed a deal to keep the official inflation target unchanged in 2025, a victory for the Bank of Thailand after it resisted calls for a higher goal that would have paved the way for more rate cuts.】

item.title: 路透社称中国计划发行创纪录的 4,110 亿美元特别债券
item.description: 据路透社周二报道，中国决策者计划在2025年出售创纪录的3万亿元人民币（合4110亿美元）特别国债，以提振正在放缓的经济。【原文：China’s policymakers plan to sell a record 3 trillion yuan ($411 billion) of special treasury bonds in 2025, Reuters reported Tuesday, as the government seeks to boost the slowing economy.】

item.title: 马来西亚出口疲软，与豆油竞争激烈，棕榈油下跌
item.description: 由于担心马来西亚出口疲软以及其主要替代品豆油的激烈竞争，棕榈油下跌。【原文：Palm oil fell on concerns about weak Malaysian exports and stiff competition from its main substitute, soybean oil.】

item.title: 与日元挂钩的美国债券收益率自 2022 年以来首次出现正值
item.description: 由于美联储降息，日本投资者的货币对冲国债收益率两年多来首次升至零以上。【原文：Currency-hedged Treasury yields for Japanese investors have risen above zero for the first time in more than two years as the Federal Reserve cut interest rates.】
